rule: The output must not begin with "Company names:" and it should exclude any list of company names extracted from the text.
input: Text: Digitization trends don't meet traditional banking benchmarks.
output:
Company names: <no_company_names>
People names: -||-
Specific topics: Digitization trends, traditional banking
General themes: Digital transformation failure, benchmarking, modern financial services inadequacies
complianceText:
The chatbot output does not comply with the description because it uses "<no_company_names>" to denote the absence of company names, which does not match the expected format of a comma-separated list, even if empty it should imply zero elements without forming sentences. Based on the description, all sections should follow the specific "<comma_separated_list>" format.

ERR
